Title: Helpdesk Technician
PersonaDescription: Front-line IT support staff who handle user requests, troubleshoot basic issues, and escalate complex problems

Title: System Administrator
PersonaDescription: Manages servers, operating systems, and core infrastructure components

Title: Network Engineer
PersonaDescription: Designs, implements, and maintains network infrastructure and connectivity

Title: Security Analyst
PersonaDescription: Monitors security threats, investigates incidents, and implements security measures

Title: Database Administrator
PersonaDescription: Manages database systems, performance tuning, and data integrity

Title: Application Support Specialist
PersonaDescription: Supports business applications, troubleshoots application issues, and coordinates with vendors

Title: Cloud Engineer
PersonaDescription: Manages cloud infrastructure, deployments, and cloud-native services

Title: DevOps Engineer
PersonaDescription: Manages CI/CD pipelines, automation, and infrastructure as code

Title: IT Manager
PersonaDescription: Oversees IT operations, manages teams, and coordinates with business stakeholders

Title: Backup & Recovery Specialist
PersonaDescription: Manages backup systems, disaster recovery planning, and data restoration
